replies.author: Ph-苯
replies.txt_content:
先创立一个记分板：
/scoreboard objectives add time dummy复制代码

将命令方块摆成这样：
         连锁↑
         连锁↑
连锁↑ 连锁↑
脉冲↑ 循环↑

脉冲
execute @a ~ ~300 ~ summon boat ~ ~ ~ {NoGravity:1b,Tags:["boat","setblock"],Passengers:[{id:armor_stand,Tags:["front","setblock"]},{id:armor_stand,Tags:["behind","setblock"]}]}复制代码

循环
scoreboard players add @e[type=boat,tag=boat] time 1复制代码

左下连锁
execute @a ~ ~ ~ teleport @e[type=boat,tag=boat] ~ ~300 ~ ~180 ~复制代码

右上连锁
execute @e[type=boat,tag=boat,score_time_min=6,score_time=6] ~ ~ ~ kill @e[tag=setblock]复制代码

右中连锁
execute @e[type=boat,tag=boat,score_time_min=6,score_time=6] ~ ~ ~ summon armor_stand ~ ~-300 ~ {NoGravity:1b}复制代码

右下连锁
execute @e[type=armor_stand,tag=behind] ~ ~ ~ teleport @e[type=boat,tag=boat,r=2,c=1,score_time_min=1,score_time=6] ~ ~ ~复制代码

使用时请同时激活循环和脉冲命令方块，且激活时间不得少于0.3秒。一般用拉杆或按钮就可以。
该模块人数不限，大于等于3人或只有1人也可以。
